articles.description: Virtual reality headset use remains low, but ownership is up among teens. Will it take just one or two killer apps in the metaverse for the boom?
articles.content: Katie Contreras and Chris Nguyen, experience experts, stand at the Customer Onboarding station for the Quest Demo space during a preview of the inaugural physical store of Facebook-owner Meta Platfor… [+11017 chars]

articles.author: Melanie Evans
articles.title: Hospitals Look to Raise Treatment Costs as Nurses’ Salaries Increase - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Health insurers and employers are pushing back against the requests to increase hospital prices by as much as 15%.
